item.description:
Hey Ya'll - - - -

So this will be awesome - I'm planning a ski trip on the weekend of Feb. 26 - 28 to Smuggs and other places. Notably there will be a Mardi Gras Festival in Burlington that weekend put on by the Magic Hat Brewery - so, good times will be had for sure... Here's the plan:

Friday, February 26th - Drive up in morning and Ski STRATTON Mtn - Note: For those of you w/ CT Ski Council passes lift tickets are only $32 for that Friday. If you can't drive up Friday morning, then just meet us up there that evening.

Lodging - http://www.greenmontf... Dorm style, converted barn, with kitchen. Awesome - only $15 a night. I stayed here a couple of weeks ago and it is truly unique and awesome. It's only 10 min away from Smuggs and 25 from Burlington. Dorm style sleeping arrangements - bring your sleeping bag!!

Saturday, February 27th - We can split the group, if need be. If you want to go skiing - Smuggs is 10 min away from our lodging, or you can accompany me to the Magic Hat Mardi Gras Fest which is sure to be a fun time - parade starts at noon in downtown Burlington!

Sunday, February 28th - Skiing Smuggs All day, then driving home. Should be back around 10pm that night.

Cost - Lodging - $15 pp. per night - - $30 total - - Cannot be beat.
Stratton, if you come on Friday - $32 if you're a ski club member, $72 normal.
Smuggs = $62, $110 for 2 days!

Check out more on the Mardi Gras fest here: http://www.magichat.n...

Unfortunately, lodging can only hold a max of 10 ppl. because it's super awesome. But there are places nearby if more people want to come. I'll make the RSVP for 15, and we can work it out... RSVP SOON PLEASE!!!!!

-dan

E-mail me with any questions - should be an awesome time!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one not climbing and going to VT.
item.name: Super Fantastic Fun Ski Weekend!!!!
